IRS990.Description: PROVIDE SERVICES THROUGH A HOSPITAL, AND PSYCH HEALTH UNIT IN HOT SPRING COUNTY. SERVICES INCLUDE INPATIENT AND OUTPATIENT HOSPITAL CARE AND REHABILITATIVE SERVICES FOR THE ELDERLY AND PHYSICALLY HANDICAPPED.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Part XI, Line 8: Other Changes in Net Assets or Fund Balances

Form990ScheduleHPartVI.BadDebtFootnote: THE HOSPITAL HAS ESTABLISHED ALLOWANCES FOR BAD DEBTS AND FOR CONTRACTUAL ADJUSTMENTS ON MEDICARE-MEDICAID ACCOUNTS.
Form990ScheduleHPartVI.ShortfallAsCommunityBenefit: THE FACILITY IS A HOSPITAL THAT IS PART OF THE PROSPECTIVE PAYMENT SYSTEM UNDER THE MEDICARE PROGRAM AND ALLOWABLE COSTS ARE REIMBURSED THROUGH THE COST REPORT PROCESS.
Form990ScheduleHPartVI.DebtCollectionPolicy: PATIENTS ARE INFORMED OF CHARITY CARE PROGRAM.
Form990ScheduleHPartVI.NeedsAssessment: UTILIZES ANNUAL STATISTICAL REPORT WITH DEMOGRAPHIC INFORMATION FROM DHS AS WELL AS REPORTS SHOWING PERCENT OF COMMUNITY BY PAYOR SOURCE.
Form990ScheduleHPartVI.PatientEducationAssistance: INFORMS PATIENTS UPON ADMISSION AND POSTS NOTICES IN CONSPICUOUS AREAS.
Form990ScheduleHPartVI.CommunityInformation: RURAL SETTING, PREDOMINANTLY AGRICULATURAL BASE, AVERAGE INCOME AT OR BELOW THE FEDERAL POVERTY GUIDELINES, PREDOMINANTLY CAUCASIAN, HIGH SCHOOL EDUCATED AND GERIATRIC IN NATURE.
Form990ScheduleHPartVI.OtherInformation: HOT SPRING COUNTY MEDICAL CENTER SERVES THE HEALTHCARE NEEDS OF HOT SPRING COUNTY AS WELL AS THE SURROUNDING COUNTIES OF SALINE, GARLAND, GRANT, CLARK, AND DALLAS. HOT SPRING COUNTY MEDICAL CENTER IS LOCATED WITHING MALVERN, ARKANSAS AND SERVES A POPULATION OF APPROXIMATELY 30,000. IT IS A 72-LICENSED BED HOSPITAL SERVING A VARIETY OF PATIENTS FROM PEDIATRICS TO GERIATRICS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS DETERMINES THE CEO COMPENSATION AND OTHER KEY EMPLOYEES ARE COMPENSATED THE SAME WAY AS ALL OTHER EMPLOYEES, BY PAY SCALE PER HUMAN RESOURCES.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE REQUIRED TO COMPLETE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE ANNUALLY. IF ANYONE DISCLOSES A CONFLICT, THAT INFORMATION IS REPORTED TO THE BOARD AND DEPENDING ON THE CONFLICT THE BOARD CHAIRMAN WILL ADDRESS IT WITH THE MEMBER(S).

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11: Form 990 Review Process
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE CEO AND CFO PRIOR TO E-FILING. COPIES ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: PROVIDE FUNDS IN THE FORM OF GIFTS, GRANTS, AND SERVICES
